question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. red chair
B. stove
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The red chair is in the foreground, positioned near the table, while the stove is further back in the kitchen area, making the red chair clearly closer to the camera.
